text:
In src/share/org/apache/catalina/connector/Connector.setURIEncoding:

         setProperty("uRIEncoding", URIEncoding);

Not sure what the intent is here, but would expect either URIEncoding 
uriEncoding.
creator: Robert_Flaherty@Hyperion.com

text:
This is not a typo. Have a look at IntrospectionUtils.setProperty(Object,
String, String) and all should become clear.

On a more general note, please use Bugzilla to report actual bugs, not things
you think might be bugs. A simple test case would have shown that this property
works as documented and that there is no bug here. The Tomcat community does not
have limitless resource and it is better for everyone if our collective efforts
are focussed on those areas where there are real problems to solve.
creator: markt@apache.org
